property-targets.title: Property targets
property-targets.desc: Scores from 0-100 based on your fat blend's fatty acid composition. Only fill in properties you care about.

max-fats.title: Maximum fats
max-fats.desc: Limits how many different fats the optimizer will use. Fewer = simpler recipes.

filter-animal.title: Animal-based fats
filter-animal.desc: Excludes fats derived from animals (tallow, lard, etc).

filter-allergens.title: Common allergens
filter-allergens.desc: Excludes tree nuts, legumes, and coconut.

sourcing-concerns.title: Ethical concerns
sourcing-concerns.desc: Excludes ingredients with significant ethical concerns (environmental, social, or political issues documented).

include-exotic.title: Include exotic fats
include-exotic.desc: Shows specialty oils like argan, babassu, tamanu, and kukui that aren't commonly available at regular suppliers.
